document.title: Getting Started
document.paragraph:
The following two tutorial style documents are available:
/general/guided_tour/language/invitation-00.xml An Invitation to Eiffel
/general/guided_tour/language/tutorial-00.xml An Eiffel Tutorial
Both these documents refer to features of classic Eiffel, and although similar, no specific Eiffel for .NET syntax or features are described. For more information regarding the
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Eiffel_for_NET.htm Eiffel for .Net Language , click
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/10_Eiffel_for_NET.htm Here .
To become truly proficient in the method, read the book
http://www.eiffel.com/doc/oosc/ Object-Oriented Software Construction, 2nd edition ; for a full description of the language, get the book
http://www.eiffel.com/doc/#etl Eiffel: The Language . (These two links require Web access.)
See Also
/20_Language/10_Eiffel_NET/Eiffel_for_NET.htm Eiffel for .Net Language
/general/guided_tour/other/one_minute.xml Eiffel Overview - One Minute Summary
/general/guided_tour/other/why_eiffel.xml Why Your Next Project Should Use Eiffel
